debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

roundingMode.label: Rounding Mode
roundingMode.hint: Standard Rounding: Round down when multiclassing with other Pact caster classes, round up otherwise (the same as non-Pact Third Casters).

illandril_custompact_a.label: Custom Pact Caster A
illandril_custompact_a.hint: Custom Pact Caster classes WILL NOT multiclass properly with other Pact Caster classes. See https://github.com/illandril/FoundryVTT-third-pact/issues/6 for details on how to use this option.

illandril_custompact_b.label: Custom Pact Caster B
illandril_custompact_b.hint: Custom Pact Caster classes WILL NOT multiclass properly with other Pact Caster classes. See https://github.com/illandril/FoundryVTT-third-pact/issues/6 for details on how to use this option.

illandril_custompact_c.label: Custom Pact Caster C
illandril_custompact_c.hint: Custom Pact Caster classes WILL NOT multiclass properly with other Pact Caster classes. See https://github.com/illandril/FoundryVTT-third-pact/issues/6 for details on how to use this option.
